SA11bsa005_u:4: Csp_2 pāramiṃ guhyamantraṃ ca śritvā bodhiḥ prasidhyati /
SA11bsa005_u:8: Csp_4 dhīmataḥ saṃvaro grāhyo bodhicittapuraḥ saraḥ /
SA11bsa005_u:10: Csp_5 kāyena manasā vācā yathoktān saṃvarān tribhiḥ /
SA11bsa005_u:13: rātreḥ pūrve 'pare bhāge na suptvā yogamācaret //
SA11bsa005_u:15: rātrerbhāgatrayaṃ kṛtvā hyantye bhāge tu jāgṛyāt //
SA11bsa005_u:20: Csp_10 pūrayeccāpi saptāṅgān vipulāṃ praṇidhiṃ caret /
SA11bsa005_u:21: bhāvayed bhāvanāṃ pūrvā kāle 'tha bhojanasya ca //
SA11bsa005_u:22: Csp_11 etanniḥ sārakāyena paraṃ sāraṃ gaveṣayan /
SA11bsa005_u:23: kāyaṃ naukādhiyā rakṣed na bhuṅktāṃ sthūlatākṛte //
SA11bsa005_u:24: Csp_12 rasāsaktyā na bhuñjīta caturdhānnaṃ vibhajya ca /
SA11bsa005_u:26: Csp_13 baliṃ suvipulāṃ dadyāt śeṣaṃ svabhuktapītataḥ /
SA11bsa005_u:30: Csp_15 sugatapratimāṃ kuryād yāvat svedo na jāyate /
SA11bsa005_u:31: kuryāt, pradakṣiṇāṃ tāvad akṣubdhaḥ praṇidhiṃ bahum //
SA11bsa005_u:34: Csp_17 yadi syāt pūjayet saṅghaṃ kuryād vā bālakotsavam /
SA11bsa005_u:36: Csp_18 pūrṇeṣu dinakṛtyeṣu bhāge ca prathame niśaḥ /
SA11bsa005_u:37: dharmatā niṣprapañcāpi tathā cittaṃ ca yojayet //
